name: Space Shooter: Galactic War
description:
Destroy the alien spacecraft before they murder you to become the galactic hero!

The fate of the galaxy is now in your hands. In this arcade galaxy shooting game, get your ship ready for invasion from space.

The ideal game to keep you engrossed and interested for hours is Galaxy Shooter!

Galaxy Shooter attack sets you on fire with limitless space shooting in the style of the classic free space games.

Can you stop the alien invasion and save the galaxy?

FEATURE:

- Fantastic shoot 'em up!

- Unending alien invasions in this challenging campaign! Your endless shooting missions need to be it!

- HD-resolution graphics.

- Awe-inspiring lighting and spectacular effects, stunning designs.

- Daily quest, lucky wheel, and free gems are available to you every day.

HOW TO PLAY:

Move and eliminate all foes by touching the screen.

Gather resources to improve or replace your weaponry.

Saving the Universe from its evil adversaries will be a difficult task for you to do. You'll be up against an increasing number of foes in dangerous settings in this shooting game set in space. You will acquire the right to modify your spaceship as the game goes on, allowing you to use it to the fullest extent possible.
